meme.title: This lifestyle is inhumane
meme.alt: Pictures of the evolution of a human man, in a historical painted style, from hunched ape to standing naked hunter, back to man hunched over a computer naked.
meme.caption: ‟this style of knowledge work, this lifestyle, is inhumane” - Bret Victor (ex-Apple inventor)

footnotes.text: ‟Something, somewhere went terribly wrong” image by an unknown artist (Localoaf, 2011) cited researchgate.net 2021
Full 1 hour talk video: The Humane Representation of Thought by Bret Victor
(He's an ex-Apple Human-Interface inventor in the Future-Interface Team)
